Apr 19, 2016 ... The coldest place in the world: Vostok Station, Antarctica. The coldest 
temperature ever recorded on Earth was -128.5F (-89.2C) on July 21, 1983, at 
this old Soviet Union outpost in the middle of Antarctica.
